mapper.select: select todo_no as no, todo_title as title, todo_dates as dates, todo_contents as contents, todo_completed as completed, todo_deleted as deleted from tb_todo order by todo_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_todo (todo_no, todo_title, todo_dates, todo_contents) values (todo_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{dates}, #{contents})
mapper.update: update tb_todo set todo_deleted = 'Y' where todo_no = #{value}
